  • Method Details

    • mode

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder mode(RetryConfig.Mode mode)
      The retry mode determining delay calculation strategy.
      Returns:
      this.

    • maxAttempts

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder maxAttempts(Integer maxAttempts)
      Maximum number of attempts including the initial request. For example, maxAttempts = 3 means 1 initial attempt + 2 retries. If null, the cloud provider's default will be used.
      Returns:
      this.

    • initialDelayMillis

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder initialDelayMillis(long initialDelayMillis)
      Initial delay in milliseconds before the first retry (EXPONENTIAL mode only). This is the base delay that gets multiplied by multiplier^(attempt-1).
      Returns:
      this.

    • multiplier

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder multiplier(double multiplier)
      Multiplier for exponential backoff (EXPONENTIAL mode only). Each retry delay is calculated as: initialDelayMillis * multiplier^(attempt-1). Common values: 2.0 for doubling delay, Default will be 2.0 if you don't specific it. AWS is always 2.0
      Returns:
      this.

    • maxDelayMillis

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder maxDelayMillis(long maxDelayMillis)
      Maximum delay cap in milliseconds (EXPONENTIAL mode only). Prevents delay from growing indefinitely by capping it at this value.
      Returns:
      this.

    • fixedDelayMillis

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder fixedDelayMillis(long fixedDelayMillis)
      Fixed delay in milliseconds between retries (FIXED mode only). The same delay is used for all retry attempts.
      Returns:
      this.

    • attemptTimeout

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder attemptTimeout(Long attemptTimeout)
      Optional timeout in milliseconds for a single attempt (including retries within that attempt). If set, each individual request attempt will be subject to this timeout. If null, the cloud provider's default attempt timeout will be used.
      Returns:
      this.

    • totalTimeout

      public RetryConfig.RetryConfigBuilder totalTimeout(Long totalTimeout)
      Optional total timeout in milliseconds for all retry attempts combined. If set, the retry logic will stop retrying once this timeout is exceeded, even if maxAttempts has not been reached. If null, no total timeout limit is applied.
      Returns:
      this.

      public RetryConfig build()
